scripts.postcss: postcss -c postcss.json && cssnano dist/arquivos/<%= projectKebabName %>.css dist/arquivos/<%= projectKebabName %>.css --safe
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist/arquivos && uglifyjs prod/js/*.js -o dist/arquivos/<%= projectKebabName %>.js
scripts.browserify: mkdir -p prod/js && browserify dev/js/scripts.js -o prod/js/scripts.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ]
scripts.icons: mkdir -p dev/svg && svgo -f dev/svg && mkdir -p prod/svg && svg-sprite-generate -d dev/svg -o prod/svg/icons.svg
scripts.jade-vtex: jade dev/html/templates-de-pagina -P -o html-vtex/templates-de-pagina -O 'jade-vtex.json' && jade dev/html/sub-templates -P -o html-vtex/sub-templates -O 'jade-vtex.json' && jade dev/html/templates-de-prateleira -P -o html-vtex/templates-de-prateleira -O 'jade-vtex.json'
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.build:html: npm run jade && npm run jade-vtex
scripts.build:images: npm run imagemin && npm run icons
scripts.build: npm run build:images && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run serve' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js'
scripts.postinstall: npm run build && npm run watch
